extendedInfo.description: All new ways to draw, guess, and share with friends! Play Draw Something 2, the sequel to the smash-hit social drawing game loved by over 100 million players!Create cool effects with dozens of new tools, patterns, stamps and colors - allowing you to transform even the simplest drawings into masterpieces.For the first time ever, share your drawings in a feed for all of your friends to see! Follow your friends, celebs, and discover new artists - thereâs always something new, funny and inspiring to check out!...And Thereâs More!â¢ GalleryA collection of all of your favorite drawings in one placeâ¢ Tons of New WordsOver 5,000 new words, including all new 9 letter words and phrasesâ¢ More Drawing ToolsLimitless creativity at your fingertips! Try out the Pixel pen, Pattern pencil, Stamps, Marker, Highlighter, Crayon and more. Plus, choose from over 100 vibrant colorsâ¢ All New Ways to PlayEarn coins for playing the Daily Guess and Daily Drawâ¢ Free DrawDraw anything. Try out your new tools, create and share something amazingâ¢ Play with FriendsChallenge friends on Facebook or be automatically partnered with new people to play withâ¢ Restricted ModeDisable the Social Feed and gallery using a PIN. You can still play turns with friends and contacts, but you won't see any social contentBecome a fan! Get exclusive rewards and stay up to date all the latest newsâ¢ Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/playdrawsomethingâ¢ Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/wedrawsomethingâ¢ Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/drawsomethingUse of this application is governed by the Zynga Terms of Service. Collection and use of personal data are subject to Zynga's Privacy Policy. Both policies are available in the Application License Agreement below as well as at www.zynga.com. Social Networking Service terms may also apply.Terms of Service: http://m.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service

reviews.title: Please fix!!!
reviews.comment: Fun to play but the interface does not fit my screen. I have a 4g LG Motion. Also, the ads at the bottom block the \"see more words\" button and sometimes I don\'t receive my turn even though my opponent has already sent this. I know this because my husband and I sit in the room when we play together.
reviews.author: Erika Arrona

reviews.title: Has not worked yet
reviews.comment: I had this on my iphone and never had an issue.  I switched to a note 2 and have never been able to play yet.  Always crashes on Connecting To Zynga.  Terrible
reviews.author: Daniel Hahn

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Has never worked once.  Keeps crashing when trying to connect.  I\'ve tried everything suggested to reset and re-install,  nothing works.
reviews.author: Danny Darko

reviews.title: frustrating on my phone
reviews.comment: keeps showing a shop connection issue and won\'t let me use the stuff i spent coins on.
reviews.author: Megan Wiedeman

reviews.title: Ummm what?
reviews.comment: So logging into Facebook doesn\'t sync your data? I have 2 devices. Why can\'t I play the same games and people on it. Well fix it Zynga! We alllll know you have 1 year left till you go broke. Make it count!
reviews.author: Matthew Nolan

reviews.title: Crashes!
reviews.comment: On galaxy note 2 10.1 Every time I send a drawing it takws me out of the app! Completelyncrashes if I do the daily draw
reviews.author: Adam Shortall

reviews.title: Android issues
reviews.comment: Its when it works...but the buttons on android are overlapping so when I try to change font size I am forced to tap the undo button instead, all the buttons are screwed, hard to browse colors ect ect.
reviews.author: James Perkins

reviews.title: Love the game!!!
reviews.comment: Why is the game taking so long to load then makes me force close? It never use to do that to me. And i\'d like to play cause i have a game that is alomst up to level 80, i have one game left then i will be
reviews.author: Lesle Marie

reviews.title: Booooo
reviews.comment: Erased all my coins!  I had just started and I had 450 now I have NONE! Not sure what happened but it would be nice to see this bug fixed
reviews.author: Jynise Bryant

reviews.title: Don\'t work
reviews.comment: It works fine until Its my turn to draw something, I go to pick a word to draw and can\'t because the boxes the word i guess supposed to be in keeps spinning and i can\'t hit anything.
reviews.author: Cassandra Kitchens

reviews.title: Would be great if it worked
reviews.comment: Keeps telling me there is a shop connection issue, no point in playing when you cant earn coins. Glad I didnt pay for this app.
reviews.author: Alisha Larson

reviews.title: Don\'t even bother doing that
reviews.comment: I got a reply sayin\' this: Your message has reached an unattended mailbox. Blah Blah Blah Blah. ZYNGA IF YOU ARE READING THIS YOU ARE STUPID IDIOTS! BEEN LOCKED OUT FOR A MONTH 1/2 NOW! Play and sync Candy Crush Saga with facebook just fine!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! -10 stars! :\'(
reviews.author: Karen Ferguson

reviews.title: Slow, ad heavy, constant crashes
reviews.comment: Ridiculously slow to load, can\'t to zynga\'s own market, crashes frequently. DS is way better avoid this!
reviews.author: Ryan Hodges

reviews.title: Update ruined it
reviews.comment: I updated the game and now can\'t even get passed the pick a word to draw. All that happens is the boxes spin and nothing works. Plus it seems to run a lot slower. Please revert back to a previous version so I can at least play again.
reviews.author: Chris Taulbee

reviews.title: Galaxy S4
reviews.comment: Wont load up or connect to zynga. Really enjoyed playing this game. ..when it used to work, wish they would sort out their issues n fast!!!
reviews.author: Nikki W

reviews.title: OMG!!!! WTH? Now you have a Daily Draw ink Limit?
reviews.comment: I loved this game until I woke up today and played.  I don\'t get it... Why this update? Now the daily draw has an Ink limit and when you were normally working on something on free draw or against someone you could still work past the ink limit by hitting cancel working hitting cancel etc etc. Now you can\'t do anything I can\'t finish my drawings or even sign my work. This is horrible Zuma is going to lose so many people from this. And I have lost sooo many drawing wtf..? AND I HAVE PROOF. I SCREENSHOT MY art
reviews.author: Joe Ruiz

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: It\'s great but ATM it is just force closing without starting even after update.
reviews.author: Jennifer Randolph

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I play this game constantly but now I cannot see any of my games or even my own drawings because it says that it cannot refresh. I play this on a galaxy tab 2 and droid HTC DNA. The support menu doesnt even have an option for this situation.
reviews.author: Josh Harris

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: I like the new features, just wish the pictures on my home page would actually load.  Update: the pictures load but now I can\'t submit daily draw. I\'ve drawn it 3 times. :/
reviews.author: laurie Mccrillis

reviews.title: WHAT?
reviews.comment: Everytime i go on it its perfect but when after a day it doesnt come up so i have to uninstall it and download it again help! =/
reviews.author: maryam islam
